//CATEGORY: The category of the chapter, either custom or just minecraft, make sure to define your own custom category if set to anything other than minecraft
//ID: A unique identifier for this chapter. This should be a string that clearly identifies the quest
//NAME: The display name of the chapter players will see
//ICON: The icon shown for the quest in the UI. Use the format 'namespace:asset_name'
//DESCRIPTION: This tells the player what they need to do or provides context
//Image: This field can be used to display and informative image at the bottom of the description
